testcase.name: Scenario Input Username and Password Login to Main Web
testcase.system-out: Given Navigation to : Main Web Login........................................passed When input username standard_user and password secret_sauce to login to web.passed Then enter dashboard page...................................................passed

testcase.name: Scenario Buy Product
testcase.system-out: Given In the dashboard page.................................................passed When Click Add to Chart One of Products in Dashboard Product................passed When Click Shopping Cart Icon with Number at The Right Top Corner...........passed When Click Checkout Shoping Cart............................................passed When Input Form ID to Continue Checkout.....................................passed When Confirm to Finish Checkout.............................................passed Then Succesfuly Buy Product.................................................passed Then Back Home Dashboard....................................................passed
